title: Can't Open a Support Ticket
body: I'm trying to get a hold of a Rioter so I can ask them a few questions. Every time I try to open a ticket, the damn thing refuses to let me login.

replies.body: It sounds like you need to get your registered email verified.  If you're having issues with that or want to use another method to contact us, just send an email to support@riotgames.com.  It works the same way as submitting a ticket!  We'll respond as soon as we can!
